text:
Overview

Today we will explore how the nervous system processes information about touch.

Learning Objectives

By the end of the lesson you will be able to describe why different body parts have different sensitivity to touch.

Do Now: Drag this tile into your workspace and answer the following questions

  1. Some body parts are much more sensitive to touch than others. What body parts do you think are more sensitive than others?
  2. How could you explain these differences in touch sensitivity? How do you think Tilly feels this sensitivity? How are her nerves impacted in her arms?
